name: Aluratek
overview:
Aluratek was formed by a group of industry veterans who believed that computer peripherals and consumer electronic devices can be both sophisticated in their function and user-friendly in their usage. Aluratek’s motto - “Simple Elegance” - precisely conveys this point. The goal of Aluratek is to embody “Simple Elegance” in every product it designs, manufactures and sells.

The product focus of Aluratek is to bring simple yet elegant connectivity solutions to the consumers to enhance their consumer electronics, communications and computing experience. Each product is carefully designed with the consumer in mind. Each product is solution-driven to address the need of the consumers and deliberately planned to provide the ultimate user experience.

Current Aluratek product offerings include the following technologies: Digital Photo Frames, External Storage, High Definition Multimedia Interface (HDMI), Video / Multimedia products, Internet Radios and Universal-Serial-Bus (USB).

Aluratek’s strong desire to continuously provide solution oriented products requires constant feedback from you our customer. It is this feedback that enables our customer centric business philosophy to continue to bring not just innovative products but also unique and innovative technology solutions to market.
